name: @discord-additions/components
description: Some helpful additions to make creating components easier.

scripts.build: rm -rf build && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && echo Build Finished
scripts.build:cjs: rm -rf build/cjs && tsc -p tsconfig.json && npm run fix-cjs && echo CJS Built
scripts.build:esm: rm -rf build/esm && tsc -p esm.tsconfig.json && npm run fix-esm && echo ESM Built
scripts.fix-cjs: sed -i '/__exportStar(require(".\/util\/types"), exports);/d' build/cjs/index.js && cp src/util/types.d.ts build/cjs/util
scripts.fix-esm: sed -i '/export \* from ".\/util\/types";/d' build/esm/index.js && cp src/util/types.d.ts build/esm/util

author: Donovan Daniels <hewwo@yiff.rocks>
